item.title: MARC Train - Tr 579 (6:35p DPT PRY) will board from the opposite platform at Aberdeen
item.description: Penn Train 579 (6:35p DPT PRY) will board from the opposite platform at Aberdeen. Please remain on the platform till the train comes testObjects a complete stop. This train will board on the middle track.
